overview: Everyone seems to go any way during a snowstorm, when everyone is stranded at Eric's place. First, a snow storm brings Eric Carter and newcomer Titan indoors for a mutually satisfying roll on the linoleum, then, Antonio Vegas bends at the waist for Jay Richards. Next, Kevin Alexander finds Rick Thomas unforgettable, then Sonny Diaz is swept away by Karl Thomas. Finally, Titan, Vincent De Marco and Robby Taylor spend time spending time getting spent.
title: Driveshaft
